column4: any got the time to help me with nvidia vs nv -- and no opengl problems??
how do i list linux channels in x-chat?
guys, how do i search x-chat for linux channels?
wont that give me every channel? i want linux channels
anyway, most channels are obvious. linux -> #linux; ubuntu -> #ubuntu; apache -> #apache; and so on
Slackware is only good if you know how to do linux administration.
ok. some way down the road for me then...
If you don't have problems with Ubuntu now you probably won't when you get to the point where you could run Slackware. :)
ill stay with ubuntu for the time being. i like it alot!
looks like there will be a menu editor in gnome 2.12 (and breezy)
